title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (langchain-ollama on PyPI) for using Ollama models in LangChain chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, packaged as ‘ollama-web’ on Docker Hub.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama, published as ‘ollama’ on RubyGems.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI wrapper adding interactive menus and batch operations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension backed by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generative or embedding nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters, published to ArtifactHub.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, importable as ‘github.com/ollama/ollama/api’.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot UI that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for creating custom Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord bot that streams responses from Ollama models into Discord channels.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot integration using Bolt framework to query local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds AI autocomplete and summarization via Ollama.
